basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello, my name is Joe Rutkin. I'm a Java developer. Before studying software development, I spent five years as a cheesemonger, building relationships with customers and colleagues. During this time, I gained expertise in my interpersonal skill set; honing my listening ability and becoming adept at identifying the needs of both my customers and co-workers. I've always been interested in problem solving and finding elegant solutions to complex problems, so, along with a lifelong interest in technology, software development was a logical next step for me. Through this change, I hope to find a career filled with interesting challenges and more room to grow personally and professionally. Thank you ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A webpage used by a fictional company to project sales of cookies per hour per location. Has functionality to add new stores to projection. Additionally has descriptive homepage.

projects.title: Personal Page
projects.description: My first webpage made while learning HTML and CSS. This simple page was a major accomplishment in my early learning.

projects.title: JS Party
projects.description: My final project for Code 201. A Jeopardy style quiz game based around teh subject matter of 201. This project was done as a group. My main contributions were in HTML and JavaScript for board functionality.
